title: JianPo
body:
JianPo


Genres/Tags: Action, RPG, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Liyou, CubeGame
Languages: ENG/CHI
Original Size: 17.2 GB
Repack Size: 8.7 GB

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on JianPo-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-jianpo.iso (18,448,416,768 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 17.2 to 8.7 GB)
  • Installation takes ~5 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 22 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Use “JianPo (DirectX 11)” desktop icon to run the game on Windows 7

Game Description

Famous sword, spiritual realm after the death of the awakening. Where is the owner? How did Gorgeous architecture and The Mysterious Island become a ruin? What happened before the destruction? All doubts will be revealed in the footsteps of the players. The day when the clouds and mists are removed is the time when the source of the spiritual realm is revealed.

Game Features

  • Swordsman Collection： Every time you defeat a new famous swordsman（BOSS）,it’s possible to get the other swordsman’s core.After embedding the sword core, the player can change into the shape and fighting mode of the corresponding sword spirit at any time. Different sword cores have almost completely different fighting mode
  • Variety magic weapon： There are different styles of magic weapons in this game. Collecting them can give you great pleasure in fighting, exploring, and growing up.Different sword core combined with different magic weapons will have different effects
  • Smart and changeable battles： In battle, two kinds of sword cores with different styles can be switched smoothly in the battle, and four kinds of magic weapons of quick equipment can also be released in the Combo
  • Elegant movement and complex terrain： The game space has large Z-axis span.Scenes is seamless. Combining the displacement performance of different sword cores, the game’s complex level scenes have also become a feature of making combat options more diversified. Players can completely change the way they pass the checkpoint through their mobility.
  • Enemy with Challenges and Different Styles： There are many challenging enemies in this game.and most of them have their own very special abilities, such as pursuing players with flying skill
